data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Georgia, United States to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Georgia, United States
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire Bible translators to communicate the Scriptures accurately in the heart languages spoken in Georgia, United States.
Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Georgia, United States that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Georgia, United States. Please, stir the 2,806,477 believers here to pray for awakening.
Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Marathi people.
Father, help the 2,806,477 believers in Georgia to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 7,821,623 lost friends and neighbors.
There are 10,628,100 people living in the state of Georgia. Only about 2,806,477 might be believers.

data.section_summary:
the state of Georgia, United States has a population of 10,628,100.

We estimate Georgia has 2,806,477 people who might know Jesus, 5,323,052 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,498,571 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Georgia, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.
